title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama’s REST API; install from PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; available on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM interface.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support for quick local labs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting pipelines use Ollama models for generation & chat.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in open-source replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama’s code models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (macOS/Windows/Linux).

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: Scripts to create custom Mistral-based Modelfiles and push them into Ollama.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around Ollama REST API (npm package).

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go.

title: ollama-docker-gpu
summary: Official Docker image with CUDA support for GPU-accelerated inference.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Utility to convert & upload Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfiles.
